title: If your main was an Undertale character, what Undertale character would they be?
body:
I think Riven would be Undyne http://orig03.deviantart.net/aa16/f/2015/344/9/f/undyne___gyate_gyate___ohayou_by_pierrelucstl-d9jp6zc.png  and if you got a problem with that

You can ether 1. http://orig05.deviantart.net/2295/f/2011/256/d/b/riven___the_exiled_whatever_by_thezatrox-d49mxx5.jpg

or 2. http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/181/828/lKRaa.gif

Draven doesn't have the class
True enough, maybe the Crazy Dummy?

Mad Dummy*

And he is obviously Aaron, with that ego.

{{champion:98}} 

Uh... Sans? Sans the humor, of course. I just said that because he shows up everywhere and is scary as shit when you fight him.

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/001/027/855/461.png
Never played Undertale but from reading on wiki I would say Asgore.

The similarity is uncanny

http://img05.deviantart.net/efeb/i/2016/117/2/b/asgore__by_walkingmelonsaaa-da0h98g.png

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fHc57YnEWSg/VUpggYd6KCI/AAAAAAAApgA/HJkBhsejNIw/s1600/MordekaiserLoadScreen_5.png

I love Excellency Lord Mordekaiser heavy metal references, and I love Asgore theme. It fills me with determination... ^_^

_"I like weapons how I like music... WITH DETERMINATION!!!"_
{{champion:14}}  Undyne. Neither will actually die when you kill them.

Who's Taric?
http://pa1.narvii.com/6118/39d137a63d3a972b7641d146a8578727295411eb_hq.gif
Duh
_The Mushrooms dance of inner pain fills you with determination_

bah he's flowey, he makes you want to hate your life the moment you know he exists!

that and them seed nukes bruh, grah.
Nope, Sans is more fitting since he doesn't kill for fun, he kills to protect people. Shaco would be more fitting of Flowey.

I don't know. When you think "You're going to have a bad time" between Shaco and Teemo, I'd think Shaco would be more fitting.

Teemo is a nuisance, but little more. In my experience, anyway.

It's more of the WHY on the bad time that matters. Shaco just does it for derps, so his definition of bad time is lame.

At least Teemo's "bad time" would be for a purpose, it would mean that the only way to get him after you is if you try to kill yordles or invade Bandle, because you're the monster in his eyes and everyone he swore to protect.
yeah but teemo's not funny in any way shape or form.
If Riot worked more on him or gave him a VU, he could be. Having about 12 voice lines total isn't exactly showing much of Teemo's humor.

shaco, a clown, has the same voice lines for attacking and moving and about 1 line each for attacking and joking. At least teemo has omega squad (awesome skin) ya know?

but main reason I think of him as flowey is he goes invisible when standing still and plants mushrooms, appearing like a plant out of bushes to murder you.

he also looks cute and cuddly even once he goes murdertime, whereas sans always looks basically the same except for his eyes. Teemo has no eyes thus can't be sans (obviously)

Gonna start by downvoting you for saying that Omega Squad is awesome, when clearly it isn't.

But on to the main point that matters, Flowey has nothing to do with his passive, and like I said, his intentions are not murder. At least to people that don't care about hurting Bandle. He does't stalk prey, he's not rengar, he's not Kha'zix, he's not nidalee, he's just a yordle defending what's important to him.

Also, with Super Teemo, it's been confirmed that he has blue eyes, like Sans, so he can OBVIOUSLY be Sans and not Flowey.
im sorry dude, but with those "friendliness pellets" and the "innocent smile", the undying teemo meme wont falter here sadly.
You know what? You're right, he doesn't fit Sans, I think he would fit Undyne better, minus all the crazy talk about Anime.

sans has eye sockets u numb nut

not human eyes

i dont have the slightest of clues... i watched one playthrough of undertale and i really didnt pay much attention lol.
Frisk because both are "mute" to a relative extent and are "possessed" by a supernatural entity of questionable morality (Sona's instrument and Chara).
METTATON EX!
I main sona... she would be... METTATON?

{{champion:89}} = Undyne. Both were single-minded in their beliefs and weren't afraid to kill in support of those beliefs. Then they meet somebody (Aspect and Frisk) and they end up becoming a lot more open-minded.
Well Darius would be.. Chara. But that's a long shot.
